name: FXEX - FoX EXtension library
short_description: FXEX is an extension library to the FOX toolkit. It contains various widgets useful for FOX programmers. This library can be seen as an add-on to the FOX toolkit, but also as a preliminary development, as some widgets may find their way into FOX itself.
